title: Rescue Dash - time management
description:
Rescue Dash is a fascinating city rescue game. We took everything that's not a boring story about a restaurant or hotel, where everything is turning into a frenzy, but a very addictive puzzle adventure!
The city is plunged into a real chaos: all the animals in the local zoo have escaped! Seals, dogs, rabbits, raccoons - all of them must be rescued and returned home! The rescue team led by the brave Jessica is in a hurry to help everyone and help the city to regain peace and order! Exciting challenges are waiting! See those children stuck on a ferris wheel? Don’t let them fall and get to a clinic, save them and make their parents happy! Walk the whole adventure with her and acquire new friends and a cheerful mood.

Help
This is a casual game for anyone who dreams of becoming a rescuer and helping people in an emergency. Don’t miss the opportunity to bask in the glory of your good deeds! This game gives you a chance to make this dream come true! Now city residents are in a panic!Wild animals roam the streets, fire burns diner, broken hydrants spray water all over the street…What are they gonna do when their familiar homescapes are thrown into chaos? Who, if not rescuers, can dash off and restore the normal way of life!

Variety of locations and emergency situations
Lifeguards are needed everywhere! Get to work in a hotel, supermarket, cruise liner, restaurant, movie studio and farm. You will have to drive a fire truck, remove trash, rebuild roads and renovate buildings, save animals and feed them tasty treats.
Try yourself as a firefighter, beach lifeguard, and emergency worker! This is not just making patiens happy in a clinic or dash in trying to deliver plates in a diner. To complete your mission, you need speed, ingenuity, and the ability to be a team player!

Resource management
In the course of the quest, you will need resources that have yet to be collected. Develop your own strategy to help you complete tasks in the way as efficiently as possible. Don't just rush into this as if you are playing some restaurant cooking games, running back and forth in madness to the kitchen, or hospital and hotel games with monotonous decorating mania. You should use your brain to win!And don't forget about the time limit! Try to solve puzzles in time!

Harder with each step!
The complexity of the puzzle adventure increases with each next level, which means you won't get bored. Unlock new locations, pass through challenging mazes, solve puzzles and receive generous rewards for a job well done!
Develop your characters and compete with other players for the title of champion of the Rescue Service! And of course solving puzzles and saving the day together is always more enjoyable.

More possibilities!
While in various cooking games, hotel games or hospital games you need to renovate some space and buy appliances, in Rescue Dash you become one with your lifeguard character. Prove to your teammates that you are the best rescuer in this city! You can pump up your hero faster if you buy additional packages of resources and bonuses.

Enjoy the classic casual gameplay
Time management games are timeless classics of casual games. Enjoy excellent modern graphics, dynamic gameplay and pleasant music. The controls are intuitive - follow the on-screen prompts and guide the character to where his help is most needed. 

Rescue Dash is the only free-to-play resource and time management game. Consider strategy and achieve your goals. Join the rescue team!

You can find the answers to many questions in the FAQ, or by contacting our in-game support team. The FAQ is available here: 
https://matryoshka.helpshift.com/hc/en/3-rescue-dash---time-management-game/

Reach out to us regarding any questions or suggestions you have. We read all the messages!

Subscribe to our social media pages to stay up to date on the latest news and to get useful tips for the game: 
https://www.facebook.com/rescuedash/

Sincerely, the Matryoshka Games team.

summary: It's not about cooking, hotel or restaurant, but it's a grand rescue mania!
developerAddress: GRIVA DIGENI 4, OROKLINI SHOPPING CENTER, OFFICE 104, LARNACA, 7040, CY
